mapper.select: select a.productCode, a.productName, a.barcode, a.imageCode, a.qrCode, a.price, a.discount, a.productUrl, a.desc, a.updateYN, a.cateLCode, b.cateLName, c.cateMName, d.cateSName, a.cateMCode, a.cateSCode, DATE_FORMAT(A.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS regdate, a.placeCode, a.companyCode, DATE_FORMAT(A.saleStart, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS saleStart, DATE_FORMAT(A.saleEnd, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS saleEnd, a.saleType, a.position from tbl_product a inner join tbl_cateL b on a.cateLCode = b.cateLCode inner join tbl_cateM c on a.cateMCode = c.cateMCode inner join tbl_cateS d on a.cateSCode = d.cateSCode where a.productCode = #{productCode}
mapper.update: update tbl_tag set productPair = 'N' where tagCode in( select tagCode from tbl_product_mapping b where productCode =#{productCode})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_product a inner join tbl_product_mapping b on a.productCode = b.productCode inner join tbl_tag c on b.tagCode = c.tagCode where a.productCode = #{productCode} and gate1 is not null
